trans-unit.source: Represents a class that is used to configure how the service authenticates users that use user name/password authentication and to configure the caching of logon tokens.
trans-unit.target: 表示用來設定服務會使用使用者名稱/密碼驗證的使用者所進行的驗證，並設定快取之登入權杖的類別。

trans-unit.source: If none of the bindings used by a service is configured for user name/password-based authentication, the relevant properties for this class are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果服務所使用之繫結都針對使用者名稱/密碼為基礎的驗證設定，則會忽略這個類別的相關屬性。

trans-unit.source: These properties include the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CustomUserNamePasswordValidator%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.IncludeWindowsGroups%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 這些屬性包括<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CustomUserNamePasswordValidator%2A>， <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.IncludeWindowsGroups%2A>， <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A>，和<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A>屬性。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.IncludeWindowsGroups%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CustomUserNamePasswordValidator%2A>

trans-unit.source: If none of the bindings used by a service is configured to use Windows authentication for user name/password, the settings related to caching of logon tokens are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果服務所使用之繫結都設定成針對使用者名稱/密碼使用 Windows 驗證，則會忽略與登錄權杖快取相關的設定。

trans-unit.source: These settings include the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CachedLogonTokenLifetime%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CacheLogonTokens%2A>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MaxCachedLogonTokens%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 這些設定包括<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CachedLogonTokenLifetime%2A>， <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CacheLogonTokens%2A>，和<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MaxCachedLogonTokens%2A>屬性。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MaxCachedLogonTokens%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CacheLogonTokens%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CachedLogonTokenLifetime%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum length of time that a token is cached.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定對權杖快取的時間的最大長度。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CacheLogonTokens%2A>.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CacheLogonTokens%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CacheLogonTokens%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> that represents the maximum length of time that a token is cached`.` The default is 15 minutes.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.TimeSpan>表示的權杖進行快取的時間長度上限`.`預設值是 15 分鐘。</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether logon tokens are cached.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否要快取登入權杖。

trans-unit.source: By default, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] security asks the Windows security subsystem to create a logon token for every incoming user name/password security token if the user name is being mapped to a Windows account.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]安全性就會要求 Windows 安全性子系統，建立每個連入的使用者名稱/密碼安全性權杖的登入語彙基元，如果使用者名稱對應至 Windows 帳戶。

trans-unit.source: This behavior can be changed by setting the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 可以變更此行為，藉由設定<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A>屬性。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> mode, the service uses Win32's `LogonUser` function for user name/password authentication.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>模式，服務會使用 Win32 的`LogonUser`函式的使用者名稱/密碼驗證。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>

trans-unit.source: If the CacheLogonTokens is set to `true`, the resulting Windows token is cached and reused for the same user name/password pair.
trans-unit.target: 如果設為 CacheLogonTokens `true`，產生的 Windows 權杖快取並重複使用相同的使用者名稱/密碼組。

trans-unit.source: The cache is valid for <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CachedLogonTokenLifetime%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 快取無效<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CachedLogonTokenLifetime%2A>。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CachedLogonTokenLifetime%2A>

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of caches is limited to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MaxCachedLogonTokens%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 快取的最大數目僅限於<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MaxCachedLogonTokens%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MaxCachedLogonTokens%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if logon tokens are cached; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果要快取登入權杖。，否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a custom user name and password validator.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定自訂使用者名稱和密碼驗證程式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> for the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> to take effect.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A>屬性必須設定為<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>如<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A>才會生效。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> property is set and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A> property is not, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] uses Windows authentication and ignores the value of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A>屬性設定和<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A>屬性不是，[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]會使用 Windows 驗證並忽略的值<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A>屬性。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> mode, the service uses <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator> for user name/password authentication by calling the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator.Validate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>模式，服務會使用<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator>進行使用者名稱/密碼驗證，藉由呼叫<xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator.Validate%2A>方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator.Validate%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>

trans-unit.source: A custom user name and password validator.
trans-unit.target: 自訂使用者名稱和密碼驗證程式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether Windows groups are included in the security context.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值會指出 Windows 群組是否包含在安全性內容中。

trans-unit.source: In most scenarios when validating Windows user names and passwords, Windows groups in which users belong provide useful information for authorization decisions.
trans-unit.target: 在大部分情況下驗證 Windows 使用者名稱和密碼時，使用者所隸屬的 Windows 群組會提供有用的資訊為授權決策。

trans-unit.source: However, if the Windows groups are not required, setting this property to `false` can improve performance by avoiding a full-group claim population.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果 Windows 群組不是必要的再將此屬性設定為`false`可以避免進行全群組的宣告擴展，進而改善效能。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if Windows groups are included in the security context; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果 Windows 群組是否包含在安全性內容。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of logon tokens to cache.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要快取之登入權杖的最大數目。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 128.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 128。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CacheLogonTokens%2A>.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CacheLogonTokens%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CacheLogonTokens%2A>

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of logon tokens to cache.
trans-unit.target: 登入權杖快取的數目上限。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the membership provider.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定成員資格提供者。

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> mode, the service uses <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> for user name/password authentication by calling the <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>模式，服務會使用<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>進行使用者名稱/密碼驗證，藉由呼叫<xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider.ValidateUser%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> for the MembershipProvider to take effect.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] ><xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A>屬性必須設定為<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>的 MembershipProvider，才會生效。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the MembershipProvider property is set and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A> property is not, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] uses Windows authentication and ignores the value of the MembershipProvider property.
trans-unit.target: 當 MembershipProvider 屬性設定和<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A>屬性不是，[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]會使用 Windows 驗證並忽略 MembershipProvider 屬性的值。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.UserNamePasswordValidationMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> property is set to `MembershipProvider` and the `MembershipProvider` property is not set to a value, the default is the <xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider> class.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>屬性設定為`MembershipProvider`和`MembershipProvider`屬性未設定的值，預設為<xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider>類別</xref:System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider></xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider> for this service.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>此服務。</xref:System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider>

trans-unit.source: The default is the <xref href="System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set this property when the credential is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試將此屬性設定認證何時是唯讀狀態。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the method of validating the user name and password.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定驗證的使用者名稱和密碼的方法。

trans-unit.source: Possible values are: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> If this property is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>, the service uses the object returned by <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CustomUserNamePasswordValidator%2A> to validate user names and passwords in incoming messages.
trans-unit.target: 可能的值為:- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>- <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>-<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>如果這個屬性設定為<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>，服務會使用所傳回的物件<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CustomUserNamePasswordValidator%2A>來驗證使用者名稱和密碼的內送訊息。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.CustomUserNamePasswordValidator%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] service is hosted in Internet Information Services (IIS) using transport-level security and the UserNamePasswordValidationMode property is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>, the custom authentication scheme uses a subset of Windows authentication.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 時[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]服務裝載在網際網路資訊服務 (IIS) 使用傳輸層級安全性和 UserNamePasswordValidationMode 屬性設定為<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>，自訂驗證配置會使用 Windows 驗證的子集。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>

trans-unit.source: That is because in this scenario, IIS performs Windows authentication prior to [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] invoking the custom authenticator.
trans-unit.target: 這是因為在此案例中，IIS 會執行之前的 Windows 驗證[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]叫用自訂驗證器。

trans-unit.source: When the value of this property is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>, specify the membership provider by setting the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> property, and then the membership provider instance specified by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> property is used to validate the username and password in incoming messages.
trans-unit.target: 當這個屬性的值設定為<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>，設定指定的成員資格提供者<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A>所指定的屬性，然後按一下 成員資格提供者執行個體<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A>屬性用來驗證使用者名稱和密碼，傳入訊息中的。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordServiceCredential.MembershipProvider%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode>

trans-unit.source: A value from the enumeration in <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 在列舉中的值<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.UserNamePasswordValidationMode"> </xref>。
